    public class IMChatMsgManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChatMsgManager<ChatMessage>, org.jivesoftware.smack.chat.ChatManagerListener, org.jivesoftware.smack.StanzaListener, org.jivesoftware.smackx.receipts.ReceiptReceivedListener, org.jivesoftware.smack.MessageListener
    聊天管理器 Created by songgx on 16/6/15.
